item.title: Nuts and Bolts
item.description: Nuts & Bolts Our Favourite Christmas-time Snack Mix A family favourite introduced by my Aunt Betty in the 1970s Prep Time 5 Minutes Cook Time 1 Hour Ingredients Flavouring 1 Tbsp. Worchestershire sauce 1/2 tsp. Celery salt 1/2 tsp. Garlic salt 1/2 tsp. Onion salt 1/2 tsp. Paprika 1/4 cup Butter Snack Bits 2 cups Cheerios 2 cups Shreddies 2 cups Pretzel Sticks 1 1/2 cups Peanuts Instructions Preheat oven to 250Â°F
